ISN'T IT A BIT TOO COLD FOR SHAKESPEARE IN THE PARK?: Iron Man and adjacent friendly characters can't be given action tokens by opposing effects.

RyJinx
One of the most unique and badass looking suits and they didn't even try to do the suit justice. No giant forearm blades, nor weapons on his back... Love the dial, but the sculpt is hugely disappointing.
April 18, 2022
hoojeebo
This is Tony from a very specific storyline, where he built a new suit specifically to battle Malekith and the Dark Elves. So your wishes for some sort of "regular" Iron Man to be represented here are decidedly misplaced.
